column5: I'm planning a trip to Canada looking at Peffleys in June or July. Can anyone let me know about the camp, the people, and the fishing at that time? Also I'm planning on taking my boat how is the parking at the landing any problems? Thanks for any information.
The area is a great place to fish. I 've fished there on and off since 85.The camp has always been clean and well run, this camp is a great place.
